webringSites.siteShortDescription: thahipster.de - Herr Montags Weblog from A to V - Tech, Vintage Computing and Tutorials
webringSites.siteLongDescription: A Weblog about Vintage Computing, Apple, Jailbreaks, HowTos, Hardware, Gadgets, Software, Tutorials and everything else.
It's all about the web here, at least that's what I'm trying to do. From opinions and practical guides to development projects and web technologies.
